summary: WINDSHIELD WIPER MOTOR FAILED INTERMITTENTLY WHILE IN USE. WHICH RESULTED IN POOR VISIBILITY.   *AK   WHEN OPERATED ON MEDIUM AND HIGH SPEEDS THE CONSUMER WAS ABLE TO RE-START BY SHUTTING THE WIPERS DOWN.  THE LAST TIME THE INCIDENT OCCURRED DURING A HEAVY RAIN STORM.   THE DEALER SAID THERE WAS NOTHING THEY COULD DO.   *SCC  *JB
